title: Call or Return
description: In this lab, we will learn about the callOrReturn function, which is a useful utility function in JavaScript. This function can be used to determine whether the given argument is a function or not. If the argument is a function, it will be called with the rest of the arguments. Otherwise, it will simply return the given argument. By the end of this lab, you will be able to use this function to simplify your code and improve its readability.

meta.title: Mastering the CallOrReturn Function in JavaScript
meta.description: Learn how to use the versatile callOrReturn function to simplify your JavaScript code and improve readability.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, javascript practice online, coding, javascript lab, callorreturn, function, javascript tutor, utility

verify.name: Verify Node Usage In ZSH History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 调用或返回
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将学习callOrReturn函数，它是JavaScript中一个很有用的实用函数。这个函数可用于判断给定的参数是否为函数。如果参数是函数，它将与其余参数一起被调用。否则，它将直接返回给定的参数。完成本实验后，你将能够使用这个函数来简化代码并提高其可读性。

meta.title: 掌握JavaScript中的CallOrReturn函数
meta.description: 学习如何使用多功能的callOrReturn函数来简化你的JavaScript代码并提高可读性。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, JavaScript练习, 在线JavaScript练习, 编码, JavaScript实验, callorreturn, 函数, JavaScript教程, 实用工具
